docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The nightshade of Watergate is providing an unwitting cover for a farreaching Administration attempt to make a 180-degree change in direction and return to the workhouse era of public welfare 100 years ago.

headline.main: Letters to the Editor; A Return to the Workhouse Era Farm Prices and Food Costs For Terminal Takeover Obligations Great and Small Exploiting Fishing Resources Off Iceland Are Sunsets Irrelevant? Lawyer Clarifies Role

docs.abstract: J Spencer lr differs with recent article on adoption which mentioned him as an adoption atty
docs.snippet: To the Editor: The nightshade of Watergate is providing an unwitting cover for a farreaching Administration attempt to make a 180-degree change in direction and return to the workhouse era of public welfare 100 years ago.
